problems.title: Fixing: guide on CrossWave
problems.description: Comprehensive guide to resolving guide issues. If your CrossWave is acting up, followed these steps.
solution_steps: Turn off and unplug the device.
Inspect the HEPA Filter for visible damage or debris.
Clean all contact points using a dry cloth.
Reset the machine by holding the power button for 10 seconds.
If the issue persists, replace the HEPA Filter.
